title: First and second members of an ordered pair

blocks.name: c1st
blocks.content: Extend the definition of a class to include the first member an ordered pair function.
blocks.origin: const class c1st { 1st }

blocks.name: diff.c1st.s
diff.c1st.c
diff.c1st.w
c2nd
blocks.content: Extend the definition of a class to include the second member an ordered pair function.
blocks.origin: const class c2nd { 2nd }

blocks.name: diff.c2nd.s
diff.c2nd.c
diff.c2nd.w
df-1st
blocks.content: Define a function that extracts the first member, or abscissa, of an ordered pair. Theorem ~ op1st proves that it does this. For example, ` ( 1st `` <. 3 , 4 >. ) = 3 ` . Equivalent to Definition 5.13 (i) of [Monk1] p. 52 (compare ~ op1sta and ~ op1stb ). The notation is the same as Monk's. (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2004.)

blocks.name: df-2nd
blocks.content: Define a function that extracts the second member, or ordinate, of an ordered pair. Theorem ~ op2nd proves that it does this. For example, ` ( 2nd `` <. 3 , 4 >. ) = 4 ` . Equivalent to Definition 5.13 (ii) of [Monk1] p. 52 (compare ~ op2nda and ~ op2ndb ). The notation is the same as Monk's. (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2004.)

blocks.name: 1stval
blocks.content: The value of the function that extracts the first member of an ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1stval(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cuni(cdm(csn(c0))))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cuni(cdm(csn(c0)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, c1st, cuni(cdm(csn(c0))), cuni(cdm(csn(cv(hs0)))))
  unieqd(cdm(csn(cv(hs0))), cdm(csn(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  dmeqd(csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  df-1st(hs0)
  uniex(cdm(csn(c0)))
  dmex(csn(c0))
  snex(c0)
  eqtr4d(cfv(c1st, c0), cuni(cdm(csn(c0))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fvprc(c0, c1st)
  syl6eq(cuni(cdm(csn(c0))), emptycls, cuni(emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  unieqd(cdm(csn(c0)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  syl6eq(cdm(csn(c0)), emptycls, cdm(emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  dmeqd(csn(c0), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  biimpi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(csn(c0), emptycls))
  snprc(c0)
  dm0()
  uni0()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(cdm(csn(c0))))
}

blocks.name: op1stg
blocks.content: Extract the first member of an ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 19-Jul-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm op1stg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2)), c0))
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2)), c0), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, cv(hs1))), c0))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c1st, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cv(hs0), cfv(c1st, cop(c0, cv(hs1))), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2d(c1st, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveqeq2d(c1st, cop(c0, cv(hs1)), c0, cop(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  opeq2(cv(hs1), c2, c0)
  op1st(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, cv(hs1))), c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2)), c0))
}

  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ c3)â†’(1st ` < c0, c2 >)= c0)
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, (1st ` < c0, c2 >)= c0, (1st ` < hs0, hs1 >)= hs0, (1st ` < c0, hs1 >)= c0)
  eqeq12d((1st ` < hs0, hs1 >), hs0, (1st ` < c0, hs1 >), c0, hs0 = c0)
  fveq2d(c1st, < hs0, hs1 >, < c0, hs1 >, hs0 = c0)
  opeq1(hs0, c0, hs1)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  fveqeq2d(c1st, < c0, hs1 >, c0, < c0, c2 >, hs1 = c2)

  op1st(hs0, hs1)

  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs1.c(c2)

  op2nd(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)

  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c2)), c2))
}

blocks.name: ot1stg
blocks.content: Extract the first member of an ordered triple. (Due to infrequent usage, it isn't worthwhile at this point to define special extractors for triples, so we reuse the ordered pair extractors for ~ ot1stg , ~ ot2ndg , ~ ot3rdg .) (Contributed by NM, 3-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ot1stg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, cotp(c0, c2, c4))), c0))
} = {
  3impa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wceq(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, cotp(c0, c2, c4))), c0))
  sylan9eqr(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, cotp(c0, c2, c4))), c0, cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, c5))
  fveq2d(c1st, cfv(c1st, cotp(c0, c2, c4)), cop(c0, c2), wcel(c4, c5))
  syl5eq(cfv(c1st, cotp(c0, c2, c4)), cop(c0, c2), cfv(c1st, cop(cop(c0, c2), c4)), wcel(c4, c5))
  fveq2i(c1st, cotp(c0, c2, c4), cop(cop(c0, c2), c4))
  df-ot(c0, c2, c4)
  mpan(wcel(c4, c5), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(cop(c0, c2), c4)), cop(c0, c2)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), universe))
  opex(c0, c2)
  op1stg(cop(c0, c2), universe, c4, c5)
  op1stg(c0, c1, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ot1stg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ c3 âˆ§ c4 âˆˆ c5)â†’(1st `(1st ` < c0, c2, c4 >))= c0)
} = {
  3impa(c0 âˆˆ c1, c2 âˆˆ c3, c4 âˆˆ c5, (1st `(1st ` < c0, c2, c4 >))= c0)
  sylan9eqr((1st `(1st ` < c0, c2, c4 >)), c0, (1st ` < c0, c2 >), (c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ c3), c4 âˆˆ c5)
  fveq2d(c1st, (1st ` < c0, c2, c4 >), < c0, c2 >, c4 âˆˆ c5)
  syl5eq((1st ` < c0, c2, c4 >), < c0, c2 >, (1st ` < < c0, c2 >, c4 >), c4 âˆˆ c5)
  fveq2i(c1st, < c0, c2, c4 >, < < c0, c2 >, c4 >)
  df-ot(c0, c2, c4)
  mpan(c4 âˆˆ c5, (1st ` < < c0, c2 >, c4 >)= < c0, c2 >, < c0, c2 > âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  opex(c0, c2)
  op1stg(< c0, c2 >, universe, c4, c5)
  op1stg(c0, c1, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: 1stval2
blocks.content: Alternate value of the function that extracts the first member of an ordered pair. Definition 5.13 (i) of [Monk1] p. 52. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1stval2(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cint(cint(c0))))
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cint(cint(c0))), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  elvv(hs0, hs1, c0)
  exlimivv(hs0, hs1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cint(cint(c0))))
  3eqtr4a(cfv(c1st, c0), cint(cint(c0)), cfv(c1st, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cint(cint(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  eqtr4i(cfv(c1st, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cint(cint(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), cv(hs0))
  op1st(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  op1stb(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  fveq2(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1st)
  inteqd(cint(c0), cint(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  inteq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cint(cint(c0))))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cint(cint(c0))))
}

thm 1stval2(class c0) {

  3bitr3g(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(cop(c0, c2), c1st, c4), wceq(c4, c0), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2)), c4), wceq(c0, c4))

thm fo2ndres(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wfo(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1), c1))
} = {
  sylibr(wne(c0, emptycls), wfo(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1), c1), wa(wf(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1), c1), wceq(crn(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1))), c1)))

  jctil(wne(c0, emptycls), wss(crn(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1))), c1), wss(c1, crn(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)))))
  ssrdv(hs0, c1, crn(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1))), wne(c0, emptycls))
  sylbi(wne(c0, emptycls), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1))))), wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  n0(hs1, c0)
  exlimiv(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1))))))
  ex(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)))))
  sylbir(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cxp(c0, c1)))
  opelxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  eqeltrd(cv(hs0), crn(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1))), cfv(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cxp(c0, c1)))
  syl6req(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), cfv(c2nd, cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cxp(c0, c1)))
  fvres(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cxp(c0, c1), c2nd)
  op2nd(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  vex(hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  mpan(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cfv(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), crn(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)))), wfn(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1)))
  ax-mp(wfn(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wf(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1), c1))
  ffn(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1), c1)
  fnfvelrn(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  ax-mp(wss(crn(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1))), c1), wf(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1), c1))
  frn(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1), c1)
  eqss(crn(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1))), c1)
  f2ndres(c0, c1)
  dffo2(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

}

thm 1st2val(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wceq(cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), c0), cfv(c1st, c0))

} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), c0), cfv(c1st, c0)), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), c0), cfv(c1st, c0)), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))

  syl6eq(cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), c0), cv(hs0), cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  fveq2(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))))
  eqtr3i(cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), cv(hs1)))

  eqtr4d(cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), c0), cuni(cdm(csn(c0))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))))

  frn(c0, c1, cxp(c2, c3))

thm op1steq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wb(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), c3), wex(s0, wceq(c0, cop(c3, cv(s0))))))

} = {

  mpanr2(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), c3), wceq(c0, cop(c3, cfv(c2nd, c0))), wceq(cfv(c2nd, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)))

  spcev(s0, cfv(c2nd, c0), wceq(c0, cop(c3, cfv(c2nd, c0))), wceq(c0, cop(c3, cv(s0))))
  fvex(c2nd, c0)
  eqeq2d(c0, cop(c3, cv(s0)), cop(c3, cfv(c2nd, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c2nd, c0)))
  opeq2(cv(s0), cfv(c2nd, c0), c3)

  eqop(c0, universe, universe, c3, cv(s0))
  simpl(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), c3), wceq(cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0)))

  diff.c2nd.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cxp(universe, universe))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cfv(c1st, c0), c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, c0)
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: opreuopreu
blocks.content: There is a unique ordered pair fulfilling a wff iff its components fulfil a corresponding wff. (Contributed by AV, 2-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm opreuopreu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1)))))
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))), wb(w1, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wb(wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  reubiia(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1))))
  impbid(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), w0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1))))
  syl5com(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), w0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1))), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))))))
  elxpi(s1, s2, cv(s0), c0, c1)
  2eximdv(s1, s2, w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1))
  ex(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1))
  jca(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)))), wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1)
  simprl(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)))
  impcom(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w1)
  adantr(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wi(w0, w1))
  biimprd(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w0, w1)
  exlimdvv(s1, s2, wcel(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1), w0)
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1), w0))
  biimpa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1, w0)
  syl(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w1, w0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))
  mpbiri(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c1st, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  pm3.2i(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c1st, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))
  eqcomi(cv(s1), cfv(c1st, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  op1st(cv(s1), cv(s2))
  eqcomi(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  op2nd(cv(s1), cv(s2))
  vex(s1)
  vex(s2)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c1st, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))
  eqeq2d(cv(s1), cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), cfv(c1st, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1st)
  eqeq2d(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), cfv(c2nd, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c2nd)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: el2xptp
blocks.content: A member of a nested Cartesian product is an ordered triple. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm el2xptp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cxp(cxp(c1, c2), c3)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  3bitri(wcel(c0, cxp(cxp(c1, c2), c3)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wrex(hs0, cxp(c1, c2), wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s2))))), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))))))
  elxp2(hs0, s2, c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3)
  rexxp(hs0, s0, s1, c1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))))
  rexbidv(s2, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s2))), wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))
  eqeq2d(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))
  rexbii(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))), wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  rexbii(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))), wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)))))
  rexbii(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wceq(c0, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  eqeq2i(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  eqcomi(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  df-ot(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c1, c2)

  sbcopeq1a(s0, s1, cv(s3), w0)
  19.41(s1, wceq(cv(s3), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wsbc(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s3)), wsbc(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s3)), w0)))

thm dfoprab3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)), w0)), coprab(s2, s3, s1, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wb(w0, w1))

  eqtr2i(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)), w0)), coprab(s2, s3, s1, w1), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)), wsbc(s2, cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), wsbc(s3, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), w1)))))

  pm5.32i(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)), wsbc(s2, cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), wsbc(s3, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), w1)), w0)

  anbi12i(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s3), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), cv(s3)))
  eqcom(cv(s2), cfv(c1st, cv(s0)))

blocks.name: opabex2
blocks.content: Condition for an operation to be a set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm opabex2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(copab(s0, s1, w1), universe))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w1), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  ssexd(copab(s0, s1, w1), cxp(c0, c2), universe, w0)
  xpexd(c0, c2, c1, c3, w0)
  opabssxpd(s0, s1, c0, c2, w0, w1)
}

blocks.name: opabn1stprc
blocks.content: An ordered-pair class abstraction which does not depend on the first abstraction variable is a proper class. There must be, however, at least one set which satisfies the restricting wff. (Contributed by AV, 27-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm opabn1stprc(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wex(s0, w0), wnel(copab(s1, s0, w0), universe))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(wex(s0, w0), wnel(copab(s1, s0, w0), universe), wn(wcel(copab(s1, s0, w0), universe)))
  nsyl(wex(s0, w0), wcel(copab(s1, s0, w0), universe), wcel(cdm(copab(s1, s0, w0)), universe))
  eqneltrd(cdm(copab(s1, s0, w0)), universe, universe, wex(s0, w0))
  syl5eq(cdm(copab(s1, s0, w0)), universe, cdm(copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), universe), w0))), wex(s0, w0))
  dmeqi(copab(s1, s0, w0), copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), universe), w0)))
  opabbii(s1, s0, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), universe), w0))
  biantrur(w0, wcel(cv(s1), universe))
  vex(s1)
  sylib(wex(s0, w0), wceq(cdm(copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), universe), w0))), universe), wral(s1, universe, wex(s0, w0)))
  ralrimivw(s1, universe, wex(s0, w0), wex(s0, w0))
  id(wex(s0, w0))
  dmopab3(s1, s0, universe, w0)
  a1i(wex(s0, w0), wn(wcel(universe, universe)))
  vprc()
  dmexg(copab(s1, s0, w0), universe)
  df-nel(copab(s1, s0, w0), universe)
  diff.wex.s(s1, s0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: cnvoprab
blocks.content: The converse of a class abstraction of nested ordered pairs. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Aug-2017.) (Proof shortened by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Feb-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvoprab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(ccnv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), copab(s2, s3, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s3), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wi(w1, wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  eqtr3i(ccnv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), copab(s2, s3, w1), ccnv(copab(s3, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)), w1))))
  cnveqi(copab(s3, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)), w1)), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0))
  dfoprab3(s3, s2, s0, s1, w1, w0)
  3eqtr2i(ccnv(copab(s3, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)), w1))), copab(s2, s3, w1), copab(s2, s3, wa(wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)), w1)), cin(copab(s2, s3, wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe))), copab(s2, s3, w1)))
  cnvopab(s3, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)), w1))
  inopab(s2, s3, wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)), w1)
  mpbi(wceq(cin(copab(s2, s3, wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe))), copab(s2, s3, w1)), copab(s2, s3, w1)), wss(copab(s2, s3, w1), copab(s2, s3, wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)))))
  ssopab2i(s2, s3, w1, wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)))
  sseqin2(copab(s2, s3, w1), copab(s2, s3, wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe))))
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: dfxp3
blocks.content: Define the Cartesian product of three classes. Compare ~ df-xp . (Contributed by FL, 6-Nov-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfxp3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cxp(cxp(c0, c1), c2), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cxp(cxp(c0, c1), c2), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2))), copab(hs0, s2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c2))), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c2))))
  dfoprab4(hs0, s2, s0, s1, c0, c1, wcel(cv(s2), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c2))
  biidd(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), c2))
  df-xp(hs0, s2, cxp(c0, c1), c2)
  oprabbii(s0, s1, s2, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c2)))
  df-3an(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2))
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(s2), c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s2), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s2), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: elopabi
blocks.content: A consequence of membership in an ordered-pair class abstraction, using ordered pair extractors. (Contributed by NM, 29-Aug-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm elopabi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c1st, c0)), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, c0)), wb(w2, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  sylib(wcel(c0, copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1, wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  eqeltrrd(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), copab(s0, s1, w0), c0, wcel(c0, copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  mpan(wcel(c0, copab(s0, s1, w0)), wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wrel(copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  relopab(s0, s1, w0)
  1st2nd(copab(s0, s1, w0), c0)
  id(wcel(c0, copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  opelopab(s0, s1, cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0), w0, w1, w2)
  fvex(c1st, c0)
  fvex(c2nd, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, c0)
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2nd, c0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1st, c0)
  diff.c1st.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2nd, c0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: eloprabi
blocks.content: A consequence of membership in an operation class abstraction, using ordered pair extractors. (Contributed by NM, 6-Nov-2006.) (Revised by David Abernethy, 19-Jun-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm eloprabi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0))), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, c0))), wb(w2, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, c0)), wb(w3, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), w1), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), w1), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), w1), diffss(s1, s2))
  syl(wcel(c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), w1, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)))))
  elab2g(hs0, c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)))))
  3exbidv(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0, wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))
  df-oprab(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  exlimiv(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0))), w1)
  exlimiv(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)), w1)
  exlimiv(s2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0), w1)
  biimpa(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0, w1)
  3bitrd(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0, w1, w2, w3)
  syl(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0))))
  syl6req(cv(s0), cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c1st, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))
  fveq2d(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))
  op1st(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  syl(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wb(w2, w3), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, c0))))
  syl6req(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c2nd, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))
  fveq2d(c2nd, cfv(c1st, c0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))
  op1std(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))
  op2nd(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  syl(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wb(w3, w1), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, c0)))
  eqcomd(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, c0), wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))
  op2ndd(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))
  opex(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  vex(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

thm eloprabi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 } â†’ w1)
  âŠ£ (s0 =(1st `(1st ` c0))â†’(w0 â†” w2))
  âŠ£ (s1 =(2nd `(1st ` c0))â†’(w2 â†” w3))

} = {

  syl(c0 âˆˆ { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }, w1, âˆƒ(s0, âˆƒ(s1, âˆƒ(s2,(c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > âˆ§ w0)))))
  ibi(c0 âˆˆ { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }, âˆƒ(s0, âˆƒ(s1, âˆƒ(s2,(c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > âˆ§ w0)))))
  elab2g(hs0, c0, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }, âˆƒ(s0, âˆƒ(s1, âˆƒ(s2,(c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > âˆ§ w0)))), âˆƒ(s0, âˆƒ(s1, âˆƒ(s2,(hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > âˆ§ w0)))))
  3exbidv(s0, s1, s2, hs0 = c0, (hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > âˆ§ w0), (c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > âˆ§ w0))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c0, hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >, w0, c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >)
  eqeq1(hs0, c0, < < s0, s1 >, s2 >)
  df-oprab(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  exlimiv(s0, âˆƒ(s1, âˆƒ(s2,(c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > âˆ§ w0))), w1)
  exlimiv(s1, âˆƒ(s2,(c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > âˆ§ w0)), w1)
  exlimiv(s2, (c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > âˆ§ w0), w1)
  biimpa(c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >, w0, w1)
  3bitrd(c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >, w0, w1, w2, w3)
  syl(c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >, (w0 â†” w2), s0 =(1st `(1st ` c0)))
  syl6req(s0, (1st `(1st ` c0)), (1st ` < s0, s1 >), c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >)
  fveq2d(c1st, (1st ` c0), < s0, s1 >, c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >)
  op1st(s0, s1)
  syl(c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >, (w2 â†” w3), s1 =(2nd `(1st ` c0)))
  syl6req(s1, (2nd `(1st ` c0)), (2nd ` < s0, s1 >), c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >)
  fveq2d(c2nd, (1st ` c0), < s0, s1 >, c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >)
  op1std(c0, < s0, s1 >, s2)
  op2nd(s0, s1)

  syl(c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >, (w3 â†” w1), s2 =(2nd ` c0))

blocks.name: mpt2mptsx
blocks.content: Express a two-argument function as a one-argument function, or vice-versa. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpt2mptsx(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpt(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4ri(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpt(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2))), cmpt(s2, ciun(hs0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2))), cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs1), c2))))
  mpt2mptx(s2, hs0, hs1, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs1), c2)))
  eqtrd(csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs1), c2)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2)), wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  csbeq1d(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2), cv(hs0), wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  op1std(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  csbeq2dv(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2), csb(s1, cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  csbeq1d(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2, cv(hs1), wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  op2ndd(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)

blocks.name: mpt2mpts
blocks.content: Express a two-argument function as a one-argument function, or vice-versa. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpt2mpts(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpt(s2, cxp(c0, c1), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  eqtri(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpt(s2, cxp(c0, c1), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2))), cmpt(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2))))
  mpt2mptsx(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2)
  mpteq1i(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2)), cxp(c0, c1))
  iunxpconst(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.ciun.s(s2, s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s2, csn(cv(s0)), c1)
  diff.csn.s(s2, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c0, c1)
}

blocks.origin:
thm dmmpt2g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(c2), cxp(c3, c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c4, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(c2), cxp(c3, c4)), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c1))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c3, c4, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c1))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)))
  dmmpt2ga(s0, s1, c3, c4, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dmmpt2g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ c1 â†’ dom(c2)=(c3 Ã— c4))
  âŠ£ c2 =(s0 âˆˆ c3, s1 âˆˆ c4 â†¦ c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c3)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c4)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c3)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  syl(c0 âˆˆ c1, dom(c2)=(c3 Ã— c4), âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c3, âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ c4, c0 âˆˆ c1)))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c3, c4, c0 âˆˆ c1, c0 âˆˆ c1)
  simpl(c0 âˆˆ c1, (s0 âˆˆ c3 âˆ§ s1 âˆˆ c4))
  dmmpt2ga(s0, s1, c3, c4, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: mpt2exxg
blocks.content: Existence of an operation class abstraction (version for dependent domains). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpt2exxg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(c4, universe))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(c4, universe), wfun(c4), wcel(cdm(c4), universe))
  mpt2fun(s0, s1, c4, c0, c2, c5)
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(cdm(c4), universe), wss(cdm(c4), ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), universe))
  dmmpt2ssx(s0, s1, c4, c0, c2, c5)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), universe), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2), universe)))
  ralimi(s0, c0, wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2), universe))
  mpan(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2), universe), wcel(csn(cv(s0)), universe))
  snex(cv(s0))
  xpexg(csn(cv(s0)), universe, c2, c3)
  iunexg(s0, c0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2), universe)
  ssexg(cdm(c4), ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), universe)
  funex(c4, universe)
}

blocks.name: mpt2exg
blocks.content: Existence of an operation class abstraction (special case). (Contributed by FL, 17-May-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpt2exg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, universe))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  sylan2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, universe), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, universe)))
  syl(wcel(c2, c3), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, universe)), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c2, c3)
  ralrimivw(s0, c0, wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c2, universe)
  mpt2exxg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, universe, c4, c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

  syl(c2 âˆˆ c3, âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ), c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  elex(c2, c3)
  ralrimivw(s0, c0, c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)

blocks.name: mpt2exga
blocks.content: If the domain of a function given by maps-to notation is a set, the function is a set. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2011.)

blocks.name: mpt2ex
blocks.content: If the domain of a function given by maps-to notation is a set, the function is a set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpt2ex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wcel(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), universe)
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  mp2an(wcel(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), universe), wcel(c0, universe), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)))
  rgenw(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe))
  mpt2exxg(s0, s1, c0, universe, c1, universe, cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), c2)
  eqid(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mpt2ex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  âŠ¢ (s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦ c2)âˆˆ ğ•Œ
  âŠ£ c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ
  âŠ£ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  mp2an((s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦ c2)âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ))
  rgenw(s0, c0, c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  mpt2exxg(s0, s1, c0, universe, c1, universe, (s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦ c2), c2)
  eqid((s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦ c2))
}

blocks.content: The operation value of a function value of a collection of ordered pairs of elements related in two ways. (Contributed by Alexander van Vekens, 8-Nov-2017.) (Revised by AV, 15-Jan-2021.)

blocks.name: el2mpt2csbcl

blocks.name: brovpreldm
blocks.content: If a binary relation holds for the result of an operation, the operands are in the domain of the operation. (Contributed by AV, 31-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: bropopvvv
blocks.content: If a binary relation holds for the result of an operation which is a result of an operation, the involved classes are sets. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Dec-2017.) (Proof shortened by AV, 3-Jan-2021.)

blocks.name: relmpt2opab
blocks.content: Any function to sets of ordered pairs produces a relation on function value unconditionally. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm relmpt2opab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wrel(co(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c4, copab(s2, s3, w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wrel(co(c0, c1, c2)), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wrel(co(c0, c1, c2)), diffss(s0, s3))
  a1ii(wrel(co(c0, c1, c2)), diffss(s1, s2))
  a1ii(wrel(co(c0, c1, c2)), diffss(s1, s3))
  a1ii(wrel(co(c0, c1, c2)), diffss(s2, s3))
  mpbir(wrel(co(c0, c1, c2)), wss(co(c0, c1, c2), cxp(universe, universe)))
  ax-mp(wss(co(c0, c1, c2), cxp(universe, universe)), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c4, wss(copab(s2, s3, w0), cxp(universe, universe)))))
  rgen2w(s0, s1, c3, c4, wss(copab(s2, s3, w0), cxp(universe, universe)))
  mpbi(wss(copab(s2, s3, w0), cxp(universe, universe)), wrel(copab(s2, s3, w0)))
  relopab(s2, s3, w0)
  df-rel(copab(s2, s3, w0))
  ovmptss(s0, s1, c3, c4, copab(s2, s3, w0), cxp(universe, universe), c0, c1, c2)
  df-rel(co(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

  |- wi(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(c2, ccom(c0, c3)))

  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  syl6reqr(c2, ccom(c0, c3), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, cfv(c0, c6)), wfn(c0, c1))
  fmpt2co(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c3, c4, c5, cfv(c0, c6), c6, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wfn(c0, c1))
  adantl(wfn(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wcel(c6, c1))
  a1i(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(c3, cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6)))
  biimpi(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cmpt(hs0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  dffn5(hs0, c0, c1)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c6, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

blocks.content: The mapping of a restriction of the ` 2nd ` function to a converse constant function. (Contributed by NM, 27-Mar-2008.) (Proof shortened by Peter Mazsa, 2-Oct-2022.)

thm 2ndconst(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  moani(hs0, wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1))))
  moeq(hs0, cop(c0, cv(hs1)))
  mobidv(hs0, wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c2nd, cxp(csn(c0), c2)), cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c2nd, cxp(csn(c0), c2)), cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(c0), c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2nd, cv(hs1))))

  elxp7(cv(hs0), csn(c0), c2)

  eqeltrd(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(c0), c2), cop(c0, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1))))))

  snidg(c0, c1)
  simprl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1))))
  adantrl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))
  sylan9eqr(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1)), c2nd)

  diff.hs0.c(cop(c0, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))

blocks.name: dfmpt2
blocks.content: Alternate definition for the maps-to notation ~ df-mpo (although it requires that ` C ` be a set). (Contributed by NM, 19-Dec-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), ciun(s0, c0, ciun(s1, c1, csn(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)))))
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3eqtri(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), ciun(s0, c0, ciun(s1, c1, csn(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)))), cmpt(hs0, cxp(c0, c1), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))), ciun(hs0, cxp(c0, c1), csn(cop(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))))))
  mpt2mpts(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  dfmpt(hs0, cxp(c0, c1), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  csbex(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))
  csbex(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)
  iunxpf(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1, csn(cop(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))), csn(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)))
  nfsn(s0, cop(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))))
  nfop(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))
  nfsn(s1, cop(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))))
  nfop(s1, cv(hs0), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs0))
  nfcsb(s1, s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))
  nfcv(s1, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))
  nfcsb1v(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)
  nfcv(hs0, csn(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)))
  sneqd(cop(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  opeq12d(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  csbopeq1a(s0, s1, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, cv(hs0))
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1st, cv(hs0))
  diff.c1st.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2nd, cv(hs0))
  diff.c2nd.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)))
}

thm dfmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  âŠ¢ (s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦ c2)= â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, â‹ƒ(s1 âˆˆ c1, { < < s0, s1 >, c2 > }))
  âŠ£ c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  3eqtri((s0 âˆˆ c0, s1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦ c2), â‹ƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, â‹ƒ(s1 âˆˆ c1, { < < s0, s1 >, c2 > })), (hs0 âˆˆ(c0 Ã— c1)â†¦[(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2), â‹ƒ(hs0 âˆˆ(c0 Ã— c1), { < hs0,[(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2 > }))
  mpt2mpts(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  dfmpt(hs0, (c0 Ã— c1), [(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2)
  csbex(s0, (1st ` hs0), [(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2)
  csbex(s1, (2nd ` hs0), c2)
  iunxpf(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1, { < hs0,[(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2 > }, { < < s0, s1 >, c2 > })
  nfsn(s0, < hs0,[(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2 >)
  nfop(s0, hs0, [(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfcsb1v(s0, (1st ` hs0), [(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2)
  nfsn(s1, < hs0,[(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2 >)
  nfop(s1, hs0, [(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2)
  nfcv(s1, hs0)
  nfcsb(s1, s0, (1st ` hs0), [(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2)
  nfcv(s1, (1st ` hs0))
  nfcsb1v(s1, (2nd ` hs0), c2)
  nfcv(hs0, { < < s0, s1 >, c2 > })
  sneqd(< hs0,[(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2 >, < < s0, s1 >, c2 >, hs0 = < s0, s1 >)
  opeq12d(hs0, [(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2, < s0, s1 >, c2, hs0 = < s0, s1 >)
  id(hs0 = < s0, s1 >)
  csbopeq1a(s0, s1, hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, hs0)
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1st, hs0)
  diff.c1st.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2nd, hs0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c({ < < s0, s1 >, c2 > })
}

blocks.name: curry1
blocks.content: Composition with ` ``' ( 2nd |`` ( { C } X. _V ) ) ` turns any binary operation ` F ` with a constant first operand into a function ` G ` of the second operand only. This transformation is called "currying." (Contributed by NM, 28-Mar-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: curry2
blocks.content: Composition with ` ``' ( 1st |`` ( _V X. { C } ) ) ` turns any binary operation ` F ` with a constant second operand into a function ` G ` of the first operand only. This transformation is called "currying." (If this becomes frequently used, we can introduce a new notation for the hypothesis.) (Contributed by NM, 16-Dec-2008.)

blocks.name: fpar
blocks.content: Merge two functions in parallel. Use as the second argument of a composition with a (2-place) operation to build compound operations such as ` z = ( ( sqrt `` x ) + ( abs `` y ) ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2007.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: algrflem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ algrf and related theorems. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm algrflem(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(co(c0, ccom(c1, c1st), c2), cfv(c1, c0))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
} = {
  3eqtri(co(c0, ccom(c1, c1st), c2), cfv(c1, c0), cfv(ccom(c1, c1st), cop(c0, c2)), cfv(c1, cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2))))
  df-ov(c0, ccom(c1, c1st), c2)
  mp2an(wceq(cfv(ccom(c1, c1st), cop(c0, c2)), cfv(c1, cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2)))), wf(c1st, universe, universe), wcel(cop(c0, c2), universe))
  ax-mp(wf(c1st, universe, universe), wfo(c1st, universe, universe))
  fo1st()
  fof(c1st, universe, universe)
  opex(c0, c2)
  fvco3(c1st, universe, universe, cop(c0, c2), c1)
  fveq2i(c1, cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2)), c0)
  op1st(c0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm algrflem(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

} = {

  df-ov(c0, (c1 âˆ˜ 1st), c2)
  mp2an(((c1 âˆ˜ 1st)` < c0, c2 >)=(c1 `(1st ` < c0, c2 >)), (1st : ğ•Œ â†’ ğ•Œ), < c0, c2 > âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  ax-mp((1st : ğ•Œ â†’ ğ•Œ), (1st : ğ•Œ â†  ğ•Œ))
  fo1st()
  fof(c1st, universe, universe)
  opex(c0, c2)
  fvco3(c1st, universe, universe, < c0, c2 >, c1)
  fveq2i(c1, (1st ` < c0, c2 >), c0)

}

blocks.name: frxp

blocks.name: xporderlem
blocks.content: Lemma for lexicographical ordering theorems. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Mar-2011.)

thm xporderlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wb(wbr(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s3), c2))), wo(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s3))))))
  -| wceq(c0, copab(s4, s5, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s4), cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s5), cxp(c1, c2))), wo(wbr(cfv(c1st, cv(s4)), c3, cfv(c1st, cv(s5))), wa(wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s4)), cfv(c1st, cv(s5))), wbr(cfv(c2nd, cv(s4)), c4, cfv(c2nd, cv(s5))))))))

  bitri(wbr(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), copab(s4, s5, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s4), cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s5), cxp(c1, c2))), wo(wbr(cfv(c1st, cv(s4)), c3, cfv(c1st, cv(s5))), wa(wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s4)), cfv(c1st, cv(s5))), wbr(cfv(c2nd, cv(s4)), c4, cfv(c2nd, cv(s5)))))))), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), c0))

blocks.name: poxp
blocks.content: A lexicographical ordering of two posets. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Mar-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Mar-2013.)

thm poxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wpo(c2, c3)), wpo(c4, cxp(c1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(c1, c3)), wcel(cv(s1), cxp(c1, c3))), wo(wbr(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), c2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {

blocks.name: soxp
blocks.content: A lexicographical ordering of two strictly ordered classes. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Mar-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Mar-2013.)

blocks.name: wexp
blocks.content: A lexicographical ordering of two well-ordered classes. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Mar-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Mar-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm wexp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wwe(c2, c3)), wwe(c4, cxp(c1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(c1, c3)), wcel(cv(s1), cxp(c1, c3))), wo(wbr(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), c2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wwe(c2, c3)), wwe(c4, cxp(c1, c3)), wfr(c4, cxp(c1, c3)), wor(c4, cxp(c1, c3)))
  syl2an(wwe(c0, c1), wwe(c2, c3), wfr(c4, cxp(c1, c3)), wfr(c0, c1), wfr(c2, c3))
  wefr(c0, c1)
  wefr(c2, c3)
  frxp(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  syl2an(wwe(c0, c1), wwe(c2, c3), wor(c4, cxp(c1, c3)), wor(c0, c1), wor(c2, c3))
  weso(c0, c1)
  weso(c2, c3)
  soxp(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  df-we(c4, cxp(c1, c3))
}

blocks.name: fnwelem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ fnwe . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 18-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnwelem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wwe(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wo(wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, cfv(c2, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wwe(c3, c5))

blocks.name: fnwe
blocks.content: A variant on lexicographic order, which sorts first by some function of the base set, and then by a "backup" well-ordering when the function value is equal on both elements. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 18-Nov-2014.)

}

blocks.name: fnse
